message: I'm proposing an equal 50-50 split which is fair to both of us. With inflation affecting me by 5% each round, it's in both our interests to reach an agreement soon. This equal division respects both our positions.
Considering inflation, I'm willing to compromise. 58-42 is a fairer split, given my losses are higher than yours.

Alice, I see your inflation rate is much higher than mine (36% vs 9.75%). Given this significant difference, I'm proposing a 53-47 split in my favor. This actually benefits you more than continuing to negotiate, as your money is devaluing at nearly 4x the rate of mine. Let's settle now to maximize our combined value.
I understand my inflation rate is higher, but I'm not willing to give up too much. 56-44 is my new offer, considering the time pressure on both of us.
